description: Async Execution Lambda - waits for specified delay before returning

changes: Changed response format to use kebab-case keys (status-code, seconds-delay)
Updated to use PascalCase for Amazon Connect input parameters (SecondsDelay)
Simplified response structure following standard pattern
Accepts SecondsDelay parameter for controlled delays
AWS PowerTools integration for logging, tracing, and metrics
Uses Python 3.13 runtime with ARM64 architecture
